data.text: @mpotkins In the past few days of “let us vote” rhetoric, I’ve not seen this mentioned once, though have not been reading Herald lately. I fear uninformed voters might not be aware, and a slim majority Yes will lead to more insanity...
@teestewww Can't agree with you there. I think media have reported this fact dozens of times in the last few months. The Herald certainly has: https://t.co/E9iR29JXB0
